### ⚠️ NOTICE: Please **DO NOT** submit feature requests / issues on GitHub
**Any pull request or issue submitted to the mirrored repositoy in GitHub CANNOT be pulled into the [main repositoy](https://codeberg.org/project-roadwork/light-reflector.git) in Codeberg/ForgeJo.**

**Please submit your issue / pull request in the [main repositoy](https://codeberg.org/project-roadwork/light-reflector.git) in Codeberg. You can do so by creating a Codeberg account or signing in via GitHub or GitLab.**

***Main Repository Link: https://codeberg.org/project-roadwork/light-reflector.git***
